betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I may have found an ally of some sort. Someone very, very powerful is on my side; well, on the side that is against the Shyre Empire at least.
It took some digging into the hidden history of Runandor, safekept by its leaders and hidden even from the Shyre Empire, a hidden history about this world's original deity (or pantheon, the language is unclear).
Whoever used to be worshipped by these people, it is a very powerful being, someone capable of touching all individuals in the universe solely through their power. A universal entity, not unlike the Meatball Man.
If the Meatball Man's power is over gluttony, the power of this being revolves around prosperity.
Alchemy is a gift of prosperity, bestowed by this power, and freely given as gift. After betrayal, though, this gift was taken away from Runandor; the betrayal, I believe, was joining the Shyre Empire.
This gift was given to me, and to many of the enemies of the Shyre Empire; is it safe to assume that this being may be my ally?
